item.title: Biden diagnosed with 'aggressive form' of prostate cancer
item.description: Former President Joe Biden has been diagnosed with prostate cancer.

item.title: Sen. Chris Murphy: 'We all bear responsibility' for President Biden's failed 2024 bid
item.description: Sen. Chris Murphy of Connecticut said the loyalty Democrats showed President Joseph R. Biden haunted the party in the 2024 election.
